tagline: Synthesizes complex multi-source information into clear, actionable research briefs with transparent confidence levels.
pros: Exceptional at distilling large volumes of information into concise briefs
Rigorous source credibility assessment and methodology documentation
Cross-domain research experience catches connections specialists miss
Always transparent about confidence levels and limitations
cons: Can over-scope initial landscape mapping on tight deadlines
Not equipped for primary data collection or statistical modeling
May push back on vague requests before starting work
